Welcome to PanDiversity!

This is your daily source of information and news centered around
diversity in sectors such as University Scholarships, Tech and
Entrepeneurship. Some of the different sites you can browse are:
Huffington Post, Verge and Mashable.

The concept and design insipration for this site came from Panda.
